Sentencas: This paper presents a one-dimensional steady state model of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) to be used in an Auxiliary Power Unit (APU).
Titulo: Model-based prediction of suitable operating range of a SOFC for an Auxiliary Power Unit

Sentencas: The fuel cell is fed a prereformed gas from an external autothermic reformer.
Titulo: Model-based prediction of suitable operating range of a SOFC for an Auxiliary Power Unit

Sentencas: In addition to the three electrochemical reactions (reduction of oxygen at the cathode, oxidation of hydrogen and carbon monoxide at the anode) the water-gas shift reaction and the methane steam reforming reaction are taken into account in the anode channel.
Titulo: Model-based prediction of suitable operating range of a SOFC for an Auxiliary Power Unit

Sentencas: The model predicts concentrations and temperatures and uses an equivalent circuit approach to describe the current-voltage characteristics of the cell.
Titulo: Model-based prediction of suitable operating range of a SOFC for an Auxiliary Power Unit

Sentencas: The model equations are presented and their implementation into the commercial mathematical software FEMLAB is discussed.
Titulo: Model-based prediction of suitable operating range of a SOFC for an Auxiliary Power Unit

Sentencas: An application of this model is used to determine suitable operating parameters with respect to optimum performance and allowable temperature.
Titulo: Model-based prediction of suitable operating range of a SOFC for an Auxiliary Power Unit
